channel.title: [421](ithink) how to make new user say old user lol!
channel.description:
ok...this will make it instead of "New User" it will say "Old User"
in [b]Class61.java[/b] search for [code]User[/code] you will find: [code]aClass50_1422 = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("New User", 255);[/code] where it says [code]New User[/code] change that to what you want it to say! :)
Yes, very nooby i think, but i just started this like an hour or 2 ago! i'm happy lol

in Class61.java search for User
you will find: aClass50_1422 = Class39_Sub5_Sub8.method479("New User", 255);
where it says New User change that to what you want it to say!
